faqs.q: How many calories in a bottle of chardonnay?

faqs.q: What's the carb count in chardonnay?
faqs.a: About 6.8 g carbs per 750 ml bottle, mostly from residual sugars.

faqs.q: Does chardonnay have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible—less than 1 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.
